General.Name: FLITTO Inc
General.Description: Flitto Inc., an integrated platform and language data company, provides various translation services. The company primarily offers online-based translation platform that directly connects requesters and translators through its Website or application, as well as handles various translation requests and translations, such as text, voice, image, and video. Its platform supports approximately 24 languages, including Korean, English, Chinese, Spanish, French, Japanese, Arabian, German, Russian, Portuguese, Italian, Indonesian, Vietnamese, Hindi, Thai, Turkish, Tagalog, Dutch, Swedish, Malay, Polish, Czech, and Swahili. In addition, the company provides B2B offerings comprising language data service and corporate translation service. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
